content.text:
# A Frank Exploration of Voyeurism and Violence

A Frank Exploration of Voyeurism and Violence was Kane Hodder's first EP. The album was released in 2004 on Suburban Home Records.
Track listing
# "Aboard The Leper Colony"
# "Simona Checks Betty's Corpse"
# "Attack On Tir Asleen"
# "The Duke Has Died and Cancer Has Killed Him"
# "Queen of Suburban Legend"
# "David Lo Pan Versus Jack Burton"
External links
*[http://www.last.fm/music/Kane+Hodder/A+Frank+Exploration+of+Voyeurism+and+Violence Last.fm page]
